entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revert WPF work around when we merge RC1 SDK #74923
    17.12
  • The JSON-RPC connection with the remote party was lost before the request could complete. #74916
  • Diagnostic severity code fix should not show for custom severity configurable diagnostics #74913

Closed

  • RegisterHostOutputs #74753
  • Nullable field warnings are missing when using struct primary constructors #74726
    17.12
  • Interceptors still require `InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces` property #74511
    17.12
  • Visual Studio does not reload source generator assemblies when they change on disk #48083
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35226.156 #74912
  • IDE0270 creates invalid code #74460
    Backlog
  • Rename session randomly dismisses itself #74347

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix broken url #74924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: readonly backing field #74922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add tests validating a particular scenario #74921
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use collection expressions #74920
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler for copilot related documents #74918
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make in memory assemblies in InteractiveAssemblyLoader can be collected when use scripting #74915
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Avoid synthesizing incorrect `allows ref struct` delegate type parameters #74914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add required `--locale` option to BuildHost #74910
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix NRE in rename #74909
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74919
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update field keyword feature name and details #74671
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #74917
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report nullable ctor warnings for struct primary constructors #74844
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • update configs for snap #74904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use InterceptorsNamespaces feature name instead of InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces #74865
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add explicit cast to UseCoalesceExpressionForIfNullStatementCheckCodeFixProvider #74471
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Double check document changes when dismiss rename #74905
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove last custom ref test assemblies #74880
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Snap for 17.12 P2 #74908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Always take ownership from UIThreadContext when rename commit #74889
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] per-file content exclusion #74903
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix copilot options default value handling #74867
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial work to create a service for returning related documents for copilot purposes. #74906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix typo in incremental-generators.cookbook.md #74642
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Fix allow ref like types for synthesized TypeParameterSymbols in Ad-Hoc Delegates #74714
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Add `IAnalyzerAssemblyResolver` public API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
